card.description: A dataset of survey responses gathered by Slovak students aged 18-21 at FSEV UK. Most responses are rankings on a scale from 1 to 5. For example, 'Rank from 1 (strongly disagree) to 5 (strongly agree): I often study or work even in my spare time'. This is a subset of the larger dataset that just focuses on personality statements.

context.potentialUses: For example, predict someone's personality traits based on other traits.
context.potentialMisuses: Using demographic information from a limited dataset to make assumptions about subgroups of people: for example, asking predictions about which genders are more likely to have which fears.

fields.description: I try to do tasks as soon as possible and not leave them until last minute
I often study or work even in my spare time.
I am reliable at work and always complete all tasks given to me.
I would rather have lots of friends than lots of money.
I always try to be the funniest one.
I can tell if people listen to me or not when I talk to them.
I am not afraid to give my opinion if I feel strongly about something.
